subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: If Michigan State and Iowa State win their next games, it would set up a rematch of the 2000 Midwest Region final, in which Cyclones coach Larry Eustachy was ejected.
snippet: If Michigan State and Iowa State win their next games, it would set up a rematch of the 2000 Midwest Region final, in which Cyclones coach Larry Eustachy was ejected.
